replies.body: Should try AD Shyv. 1 Shot carries with Q. (Ie, PD Youmuu's) (Crit DMG Quints and Marks Jungle) 1 shot a Lucian at level 12 confirmed.
The second the enemy realises you are squishy as fuck it is game over though.

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lZE3E5uN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-18T05:17:47.249+0000)
>
> The second the enemy realises you are squishy as fuck it is game over though.

You mean, like almost every other AP mid, ever? It's part of the role.

She has her mobility.

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lZE3E5uN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-18T05:17:47.249+0000)
>
> The second the enemy realises you are squishy as fuck it is game over though.

You don't need to be squishy to have 40% cdr.
I suggest AP Draven for more challenge

And you lose your mana pool in 3 casts.

#buffahri
Athene's Unholy Grail to the rescue.
